verses.verse: I <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because he <S%H8085>heareth<s%> My <S%H6963>voice<s%> and my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
Because he hath <S%H5186>inclined<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, Therefore will I call upon him as long as I <S%H3117>live<s%>.

The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> <S%H4712>me<s%>, And the pains of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> gat <S%H4672>hold<s%> upon <S%H4672>me<s%>: I found <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>.
Then <S%H7121>called<s%> I upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> <S%H4422>thee<s%>, deliver my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Gracious <S%H2587><s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H430>Yea<s%>, our God is <S%H7355>merciful<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> the <S%H6612>simple<s%>: I was brought <S%H1809>low<s%>, and he saved <S%H3467>me<s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%> unto thy <S%H4494>rest<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath dealt bountifully with <S%H1580>thee<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H2502>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>, Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears<s%>, And my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling<s%>.
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
I <S%H539>believe<s%>, for I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>: I was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>:
What shall I <S%H7725>render<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> For all his benefits toward <S%H8408>me<s%>?
I will <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5971>Yea<s%>, in the presence of all his people.
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Is the <S%H4194>death<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H577>truly<s%> I am thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: I am thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>; Thou hast <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H4147>bonds<s%>.
I will <S%H2076>offer<s%> to thee the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, And will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5971>Yea<s%>, in the presence of all his people,
In the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>thee<s%>, O Jerusalem. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
